statsAutres.languages: Understands languages from his past life but can't speak

features.name: Speed of the Dead
features.description: You roll with advantage when you make opportunity attacks. If you hit with an opportunity attack, you add 3 (1d6) to the damage dealt.

features.name: Longsword
features.description: Melee: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.
